ADDED_TABLE.DEFINITION: create table CollectData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , "DISPLAYNAME" VARCHAR(100), "TARGETADDRESS" VARCHAR(50), "RESOURCETYPE" VARCHAR(50), "CONFIGCLASS" VARCHAR(100), "DCCLASS" VARCHAR(100), "DCXMLNAME" VARCHAR(50), "DCDTDNAME" VARCHAR(50), "ACTIVE" VARCHAR(10), "STOREDATA" VARCHAR(10), "CONFIGURED" VARCHAR(10), "POLLINTERVAL" INTEGER , "APPLNDISCPORT" INTEGER , "WEBNMS" VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table OracleCollectData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "USERNAME" VARCHAR(50), "PASSWORD" VARCHAR(50), "INSTANCENAME" VARCHAR(50), "DRIVERNAME" VARCHAR(100), "STATE" INTEGER , "COLLECTSTATICDATA" VARCHAR(10), "ERRORMSG" VARCHAR(250), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table InstanceDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "VERSION" VARCHAR(17), "STARTUPTIME" VARCHAR(50), "CREATED" VARCHAR(50), "OPENMODE" VARCHAR(20), "LOGMODE" VARCHAR(50), "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table InstanceStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "DBSIZE" BIGINT, "AVGEXECS" INTEGER, "AVGUSERS" INTEGER, "InstanceREADS" INTEGER, "InstanceWRITES" INTEGER, "BLOCKSIZE" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table SgaDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "BUFFERCACHESIZE" INTEGER, "SHAREDPOOLSIZE" INTEGER , "REDOLOGBUFFERSIZE" INTEGER , "LIBRARYCACHESIZE" INTEGER , "DATADICTCACHESIZE" INTEGER , "SQLAREASIZE" INTEGER , "FIXEDSIZE" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table SgaStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "FREEMEMORYSIZE" INTEGER, "BUFFERHITRATIO" INTEGER, "DICTIONARYHITRATIO" INTEGER, "LIBRARYHITRATIO" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table SessionInfo ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "SESSIONID" INTEGER , "STATUS" VARCHAR(25), "MACHINE" VARCHAR(50), "USERNAME" VARCHAR(25), "ELAPSEDTIME" INTEGER, "CPUUSED" INTEGER , "MEMORYSORTS" INTEGER , "TABLESCANS" INTEGER , "PHYSICALREADS" INTEGER , "LOGICALREADS" INTEGER , "DISKSORTS" INTEGER , "BLOCKSCHANGED" INTEGER , "CHAINEDROWS" INTEGER , "COMMITS" INTEGER , "CURSORS" INTEGER , "BUFFERCACHEHITRATIO" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table RollbackData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "SEGMENTNAME" VARCHAR(25), "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(20), "INITIALEXTENT" INTEGER , "NEXTEXTENT" INTEGER , "MINEXTENT" INTEGER , "MAXEXTENT" INTEGER , "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "CURRENTSIZE" INTEGER , "BLOCKS" INTEGER , "GETS" INTEGER , "WAITS" INTEGER , "HWMSIZE" INTEGER , "SHRINKS" INTEGER , "WRAPS" INTEGER , "EXTEND" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table DataFiles ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "FILE_NAME" VARCHAR(100), "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(25), "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "CREATEBYTES" INTEGER , "DataFilesREADS" INTEGER , "DataFilesWRITES" INTEGER , "AVGRDTIME" INTEGER , "AVGWRTIME" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table RedoLogs ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "GROUPNAME" VARCHAR(25), "THREAD" VARCHAR(20), "SEQUENCE" INTEGER , "BYTES" INTEGER , "MEMBERS" INTEGER , "ARCHIVE" VARCHAR(10), "STATUS" VARCHAR(20), "FIRSTTIME" VARCHAR(50), "MEMBER" VARCHAR(100), "MSTATUS" VARCHAR(50), "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table TableSpaceDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(50), "ALLOCATEDBYTES" BIGINT , "ALLOCATEDBLOCKS" INTEGER , "DATAFILES" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table TableSpaceStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(25), "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "FREEBYTES" BIGINT , "FREEBLOCKS" INTEGER , "TableSpaceREADS" INTEGER , "TableSpaceWRITES" INTEGER , "TableSpaceREADTIME" BIGINT, "TableSpaceWRITETIME" BIGINT, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table HostDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "USERNAME" VARCHAR(25), "PASSWORD" VARCHAR(50), "PROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "CATEGORY" VARCHAR(250), "ERRORMSG" VARCHAR(200), "LOGINPROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "PASSWORDPROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "CLIPROTOCOL" VARCHAR(25), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table HostDataCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "CATEGORY" VARCHAR(250), "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "CURVALUE" BIGINT, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT, index HostDataCollected0_ndx("COLLECTIONTIME"), index HostDataCollected1_ndx("RESOURCENAME","CATEGORY","ENTITY","COLLECTIONTIME"), index HostDataCollected2_ndx("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME","CATEGORY","COLLECTIONTIME"), index HostDataCollected3_ndx("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME","CATEGORY"), index HostDataCollected4_ndx("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME","CATEGORY","ENTITY"))

create table HostDataHourlyCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "MINVALUE" BIGINT, "MAXVALUE" BIGINT, "AVGVALUE" BIGINT, "TIMEINTERVAL" BIGINT, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table HostDataDailyCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "MINVALUE" BIGINT, "MAXVALUE" BIGINT, "AVGVALUE" BIGINT, "TIMEINTERVAL" BIGINT, "COLLECTIONTIME" BIGINT)

create table CollectData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , "DISPLAYNAME" VARCHAR(100), "TARGETADDRESS" VARCHAR(50), "RESOURCETYPE" VARCHAR(50), "CONFIGCLASS" VARCHAR(100), "DCCLASS" VARCHAR(100), "DCXMLNAME" VARCHAR(50), "DCDTDNAME" VARCHAR(50), "ACTIVE" VARCHAR(10), "STOREDATA" VARCHAR(10), "CONFIGURED" VARCHAR(10), "POLLINTERVAL" INTEGER , "APPLNDISCPORT" INTEGER , "WEBNMS" VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table OracleCollectData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "USERNAME" VARCHAR(50), "PASSWORD" VARCHAR(50), "INSTANCENAME" VARCHAR(50), "DRIVERNAME" VARCHAR(100), "STATE" INTEGER , "COLLECTSTATICDATA" VARCHAR(10), "ERRORMSG" VARCHAR(250), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table InstanceDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "VERSION" VARCHAR(17), "STARTUPTIME" VARCHAR(50), "CREATED" VARCHAR(50), "OPENMODE" VARCHAR(20), "LOGMODE" VARCHAR(50), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table InstanceStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "DBSIZE" NUMBER(19), "AVGEXECS" INTEGER, "AVGUSERS" INTEGER, "InstanceREADS" INTEGER, "InstanceWRITES" INTEGER, "BLOCKSIZE" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table SgaDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "BUFFERCACHESIZE" INTEGER, "SHAREDPOOLSIZE" INTEGER , "REDOLOGBUFFERSIZE" INTEGER , "LIBRARYCACHESIZE" INTEGER , "DATADICTCACHESIZE" INTEGER , "SQLAREASIZE" INTEGER , "FIXEDSIZE" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table SgaStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "FREEMEMORYSIZE" INTEGER, "BUFFERHITRATIO" INTEGER, "DICTIONARYHITRATIO" INTEGER, "LIBRARYHITRATIO" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table SessionInfo ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "SESSIONID" INTEGER , "STATUS" VARCHAR(25), "MACHINE" VARCHAR(50), "USERNAME" VARCHAR(25), "ELAPSEDTIME" INTEGER, "CPUUSED" INTEGER , "MEMORYSORTS" INTEGER , "TABLESCANS" INTEGER , "PHYSICALREADS" INTEGER , "LOGICALREADS" INTEGER , "DISKSORTS" INTEGER , "BLOCKSCHANGED" INTEGER , "CHAINEDROWS" INTEGER , "COMMITS" INTEGER , "CURSORS" INTEGER , "BUFFERCACHEHITRATIO" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table RollbackData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "SEGMENTNAME" VARCHAR(25), "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(20), "INITIALEXTENT" INTEGER , "NEXTEXTENT" INTEGER , "MINEXTENT" INTEGER , "MAXEXTENT" INTEGER , "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "CURRENTSIZE" INTEGER , "BLOCKS" INTEGER , "GETS" INTEGER , "WAITS" INTEGER , "HWMSIZE" INTEGER , "SHRINKS" INTEGER , "WRAPS" INTEGER , "EXTEND" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table DataFiles ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "FILE_NAME" VARCHAR(100), "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(25), "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "CREATEBYTES" INTEGER , "DataFilesREADS" INTEGER , "DataFilesWRITES" INTEGER , "AVGRDTIME" INTEGER , "AVGWRTIME" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table RedoLogs ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "GROUPNAME" VARCHAR(25), "THREAD" VARCHAR(20), "SEQUENCE" INTEGER , "BYTES" INTEGER , "MEMBERS" INTEGER , "ARCHIVE" VARCHAR(10), "STATUS" VARCHAR(20), "FIRSTTIME" VARCHAR(50), "MEMBER" VARCHAR(100), "MSTATUS" VARCHAR(50), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table TableSpaceDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(50), "ALLOCATEDBYTES" NUMBER(19) , "ALLOCATEDBLOCKS" INTEGER , "DATAFILES" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table TableSpaceStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(25), "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "FREEBYTES" NUMBER(19) , "FREEBLOCKS" INTEGER , "TableSpaceREADS" INTEGER , "TableSpaceWRITES" INTEGER , "TableSpaceREADTIME" NUMBER(19), "TableSpaceWRITETIME" NUMBER(19), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table HostDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "USERNAME" VARCHAR(25), "PASSWORD" VARCHAR(50), "PROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "CATEGORY" VARCHAR(250), "ERRORMSG" VARCHAR(200), "LOGINPROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "PASSWORDPROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "CLIPROTOCOL" VARCHAR(25),PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table HostDataCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "CATEGORY" VARCHAR(250), "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "CURVALUE" NUMBER(19), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table HostDataHourlyCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "MINVALUE" NUMBER(19), "MAXVALUE" NUMBER(19), "AVGVALUE" NUMBER(19), "TIMEINTERVAL" NUMBER(19), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table HostDataDailyCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "MINVALUE" NUMBER(19), "MAXVALUE" NUMBER(19), "AVGVALUE" NUMBER(19), "TIMEINTERVAL" NUMBER(19), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMBER(19))

create table CollectData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , "DISPLAYNAME" VARCHAR(100), "TARGETADDRESS" VARCHAR(50), "RESOURCETYPE" VARCHAR(50), "CONFIGCLASS" VARCHAR(100), "DCCLASS" VARCHAR(100), "DCXMLNAME" VARCHAR(50), "DCDTDNAME" VARCHAR(50), "ACTIVE" VARCHAR(10), "STOREDATA" VARCHAR(10), "CONFIGURED" VARCHAR(10), "POLLINTERVAL" INTEGER , "APPLNDISCPORT" INTEGER , "WEBNMS" VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table OracleCollectData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "USERNAME" VARCHAR(50), "PASSWORD" VARCHAR(50), "INSTANCENAME" VARCHAR(50), "DRIVERNAME" VARCHAR(100), "STATE" INTEGER , "COLLECTSTATICDATA" VARCHAR(10), "ERRORMSG" VARCHAR(250), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table InstanceDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "VERSION" VARCHAR(17), "STARTUPTIME" VARCHAR(50), "CREATED" VARCHAR(50), "OPENMODE" VARCHAR(20), "LOGMODE" VARCHAR(50), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0), PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table InstanceStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "DBSIZE" NUMERIC(19,0), "AVGEXECS" INTEGER, "AVGUSERS" INTEGER, "InstanceREADS" INTEGER, "InstanceWRITES" INTEGER, "BLOCKSIZE" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table SgaDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "BUFFERCACHESIZE" INTEGER, "SHAREDPOOLSIZE" INTEGER , "REDOLOGBUFFERSIZE" INTEGER , "LIBRARYCACHESIZE" INTEGER , "DATADICTCACHESIZE" INTEGER , "SQLAREASIZE" INTEGER , "FIXEDSIZE" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table SgaStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "FREEMEMORYSIZE" INTEGER, "BUFFERHITRATIO" INTEGER, "DICTIONARYHITRATIO" INTEGER, "LIBRARYHITRATIO" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table SessionInfo ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "SESSIONID" INTEGER , "STATUS" VARCHAR(25), "MACHINE" VARCHAR(50), "USERNAME" VARCHAR(25), "ELAPSEDTIME" INTEGER, "CPUUSED" INTEGER , "MEMORYSORTS" INTEGER , "TABLESCANS" INTEGER , "PHYSICALREADS" INTEGER , "LOGICALREADS" INTEGER , "DISKSORTS" INTEGER , "BLOCKSCHANGED" INTEGER , "CHAINEDROWS" INTEGER , "COMMITS" INTEGER , "CURSORS" INTEGER , "BUFFERCACHEHITRATIO" INTEGER, "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table RollbackData ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "SEGMENTNAME" VARCHAR(25), "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(20), "INITIALEXTENT" INTEGER , "NEXTEXTENT" INTEGER , "MINEXTENT" INTEGER , "MAXEXTENT" INTEGER , "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "CURRENTSIZE" INTEGER , "BLOCKS" INTEGER , "GETS" INTEGER , "WAITS" INTEGER , "HWMSIZE" INTEGER , "SHRINKS" INTEGER , "WRAPS" INTEGER , "EXTEND" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table DataFiles ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "FILE_NAME" VARCHAR(100), "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(25), "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "CREATEBYTES" INTEGER , "DataFilesREADS" INTEGER , "DataFilesWRITES" INTEGER , "AVGRDTIME" INTEGER , "AVGWRTIME" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table RedoLogs ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "GROUPNAME" VARCHAR(25), "THREAD" VARCHAR(20), "SEQUENCE" INTEGER , "BYTES" INTEGER , "MEMBERS" INTEGER , "ARCHIVE" VARCHAR(10), "STATUS" VARCHAR(20), "FIRSTTIME" VARCHAR(50), "MEMBER" VARCHAR(100), "MSTATUS" VARCHAR(50), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table TableSpaceDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(50), "ALLOCATEDBYTES" NUMERIC(19,0) , "ALLOCATEDBLOCKS" INTEGER , "DATAFILES" INTEGER , "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table TableSpaceStatus ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "TABLESPACENAME" VARCHAR(25), "STATUS" VARCHAR(50), "FREEBYTES" NUMERIC(19,0) , "FREEBLOCKS" INTEGER , "TableSpaceREADS" INTEGER , "TableSpaceWRITES" INTEGER , "TableSpaceREADTIME" NUMERIC(19,0), "TableSpaceWRITETIME" NUMERIC(19,0), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table HostDetails ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "USERNAME" VARCHAR(25), "PASSWORD" VARCHAR(50), "PROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "CATEGORY" VARCHAR(250), "ERRORMSG" VARCHAR(200), "LOGINPROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "PASSWORDPROMPT" VARCHAR(50), "CLIPROTOCOL" VARCHAR(25),PRIMARY KEY ("RESOURCENAME","COMPONENTNAME"))

create table HostDataCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "COMPONENTNAME" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "CATEGORY" VARCHAR(250), "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "CURVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table HostDataHourlyCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "MINVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "MAXVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "AVGVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "TIMEINTERVAL" NUMERIC(19,0), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))

create table HostDataDailyCollected ("RESOURCENAME" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "ENTITY" VARCHAR(50), "MINVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "MAXVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "AVGVALUE" NUMERIC(19,0), "TIMEINTERVAL" NUMERIC(19,0), "COLLECTIONTIME" NUMERIC(19,0))
